name: Anne
info: A Sinner who is adept at supporting allies. Increases Energy Recovery Speed by 10%

media.title: JP Anne Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

guideMedia.title: Anne VS Boss AoE Healing Showcase
guideMedia.author: Jiu Jiu subs

criminalRecord:
Carried out medical activities in a controversial organization "SALVA" that hid the Sinner's identity for a long time. As the clinic's head nurse, the subject collected and froze the remains of Mania patients without the patients' permission. Associated with the incident the subject was involved in years ago--the alleged loss of a high-risk contaminant source at the Eastside-Syndicate isolation site--the subject was judged to have a high Mania transmission risk and needed to be in targeted control.

--

While she worked at the //SALVA Hospital//, the subject mainly provided auxiliary medical care. She preserved the Mania patients' bodies in the hope of searching for a cure and she never took part in any illegal activity.

Other allegations against the subject have been proven untrue. During the Syndican quarantine point incident, the subject's power awakened when she was treating a patient. She was hence not infected and her special power doesn't come with a risk of infection.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary

Able to change fluid's chemical properties and gives drugs in syringes better healing effect according to the patient's needs.

+++* Awakening Signs

Recently awakened. The subject claimed to have been in a confined room with several infected patients for an extended period of time. Mutation was presumed to occur due to the overwhelming stress. Detailed background is to be investigated.

+++* Corruption State

No visual mutation was found. My mental state was normal, but with severe nightmares and failed psychological tests. The mental erosion symptoms may be suppressed through subjective strong mental power.
ecbFlavourText: "Even if there is only a tiny sliver of hope, I won't give up."
interrogation1:
Anne, though exhausted and on guard after the events of SALVA Chaos, readily tells the Chief about her awakening as a Sinner. She explains that the Corruptor corpses in the SALVA basement belong to the 89 people who died alongside her while treating a Syndican Mania outbreak, and that her awakening was what allowed her to live on the sole survivor. She asks that SALVA be allowed to stay open and states that the crimes committed there were hers alone. When the Chief asks her why she kept the bodies after she knew they were dead, she tries to dismiss it as symptoms of her Mania, but as the Chief reads out the logs she kept on their condition over the years, Anne snaps and snatches the notebook away from them. When asked if she believes she can bring the corpses back from the dead, Anne goes silent. She exclaims that she has been hearing their voices, pleading for her help even after all this time, and refuses to accept that it might be a Mania hallucination. The Chief tries to dismiss it, but Anne remains adamant, saying that Iron allowed her to keep the corpses because she also heard their voices. She says that having given them all hope in their final moments, she can't let them down again. The Chief then reveals the true purpose of the interrogation: the MBCC received orders from the FAC to dispose of the remains. Anne seems on the verge of tears, asking if the Chief supports the removal. Although the Chief treads carefully through their next words, Anne still likens the Chief to the FAC troops who cut off her and the others from survival. Despondent, she walks out of the interrogation room as if in a daze. She mumbles about protecting Paige, the youngest and first of the names in her notebook, regarding whom she seems to harbor especially strong feelings of guilt. With the Chief alone, Nightingale reaches out over the comm system. The two discuss Anne's reliability and seeming stability over her tenure as head nurse, and the Chief believes that this is a decision that Anne will be able to reach herself. Until then, they will delay the removal with the FAC as long as possible. Before they depart, the Chief remembers the name Paige, thinking that it might be the key to helping Anne move on.

You couldn't persuade Anne to open the immersion tank. The remains of Corruptors stored beneath SALVA are still a threat. Fortunately, this interrogation wasn't a waste of time because you now understand why Anne is being so stubborn and how she became a Sinner. Having learned Anne's story, you decide to give her time to make up her mind, believing that there will come a day when she opens up her heart to you.
interrogation2:
In searching for a Maniac around Paige's age, Nightingale provides the Chief with a case file of a young boy reportedly chased out of Eastside. Despite Nightingale's protests, the Chief goes with Anne alone to the border between Syndicate and the Rust, where they find the boy in question. His condition is dire, showing heavy signs of physical mutation, and Anne offers him painkillers and anesthetics. Instead, the boy asks for sweets, which Anne also carries with her on account treating children in the past. When Anne asks if there's anything else he wants, he says that he wants to go to Eastside. Seeing that Anne is unable to ask the question on her mind, the Chief asks it for her: "Don't you want to live?" The boy says he does, but also doesn't have strong hopes in his condition. When reassuring him fails, Anne apologizes for her inability to help, to which the boy says that "it's boring to live just for the sake of staying alive." His words remind Anne of her time treating the outbreak patients, specifically when she asked Paige about her wishes - the girl replied she would be fine with anything as long as she got to stay with Anne. Anne then asks the boy if he really wouldn't blame her if she failed to save him after promising she would, and he nonchalantly reaffirms that he wouldn't. Anne thanks the Chief, then offers the boy two choices: special medicine designed by her and Iron that would give him another month of life, or a painless death via her syringe gun. The boy chooses the medicine. The Chief is surprised that Anne didn't mention a third option, but Anne seems resolved not to repeat the mistakes of her past. Still, when the Chief agrees to disobey protocol and let the boy go, Anne concocts a plan to have her take the blame for them. The Chief reassures her, then tells the boy that while he can go to the Rust, he has to avoid other humans. The boy gives his name - Gary - and thanks them, telling them to visit Eastside in his stead.

You found the surviving Maniac boy. Though he's still young, he has his own understanding of life and death. His optimism and carefree nature had a somewhat positive impact on Anne's stubbornness. Although Gary will eventually die inevitably, there were two strangers in his life, helping extend his lifespan by a month, and showing him more of this world.
interrogation3:
Hecate confirms with the Chief that Anne has given her approval for the cleanup effort. The two stand before the tank of corpses without her, but Hecate says that Anne instructed her on how to operate the tank, as well as giving her a notebook to pass along to the Chief. It's Anne's patient records, but as the Chief reads, they realize new information has been added to each one: their wishes, including Gary's. In the middle of the notebook is a letter addressed to the Chief. In it, Anne apologizes for all the trouble she may have caused the Chief, confessing that her obsession with bringing her patients back from the dead was a lie she told herself to hide her guilt. As long as she lives, they will live on in her memory. She resolves to continue to researching Mania, believing that the Sinner awakening may hold the key to a cure, and volunteers herself as a human test subject. Feeling the weight of Anne's words, the Chief leaves Hecate to handle the cleanup, finding Anne stargazing in a secluded corner of the Bureau. Anne recognizes the Chief by their footsteps, musing that Iron's sound like she's always in a hurry; Victoria's are curious, light, and airy; and the Chief's are gentle but firm, confident in their direction, yet conscious of disturbing others. Anne knows the Chief has come to comfort her, but reassures them that she has bid her farewells to the ones she obsessed over for so long. She thanks the Chief, regretting not being able to give them anything in return. The Chief replies that she can repay them with herself, inviting a rare tease from Anne, who seems relaxed and carefree as the Chief blushes over their choice of words. In the distance, they hear the rumble of the containment tank's destruction, followed by the smell of the solution in which the bodies were stored. As the two stare up at the sky in solemn silence, they see a meteor, but Anne, voice choking, says that it must be Paige.

Anne finally decided to confront the truth of the Maniacs' death and cooperate with the FAC to clean up the mess. She sent you a letter to tell you all about the thoughts in her mind. Carrying the wishes of the dead, the two of you evermore continue to fight the Mania.
arrestRec1: Due to the SALVA Hospital force, Eastside failed to arrest the subject and handed the subject over to the MBCC for enforcement. The subject defended SALVA Hospital and showed no resistance during the arrest.
arrestRec2: Born in the Syndicate slums, while parents died nine years ago due to the inability to pay for medical treatment. While parents were ill, the subject was left to take care of the family alone.
arrestRec3: Entered Banyan Medical College to study for a nursing degree in Eastside through self-study, and later worked at a first-line Eastside public hospital. The subject's qualification was revoked after the isolation site incident, then the subject was hired by the SALVA Hospital as a head nurse.
arrestRec4: After the outbreak of contamination at the isolation site, the FAC immediately blocked the news and reached an agreement with the subject to execute all infected patients within a time limit. The subject violated the agreement and escaped with the patient, "Perry." The FAC masked this infection as a viral epidemic.
servingTerm1: Took up the responsibility for medical treatment and relieved the burden on the MBCC's medical department. No one has ever seen the subject without a uniform. The question of "when does Anne get off work" has become a popular topic among Sinners.
servingTerm2: Has a stable work relationship with the SALVA Hospital and will regularly inquire about patients' conditions remotely. It is reported that the banners and bouquets the subject received from recovered patients have flooded the SALVA Hospital and will be transferred to be stored at the MBCC temporarily.
servingTerm3: Feared by some Sinners due to the subject's crime of freezing the infected. After knowing that the subject had no interest in studying Sinners, the tension has eased. The young Sinners even became overly dependent on the subject and lost the ability to look after themselves under Anne's meticulous care.
servingTerm4: Forbids the Chief to stay up late and often gives the Chief spontaneous checks late at night. If the Chief is found to be using electronic devices in a dark environment, the devices will be confiscated immediately. The next morning, the confiscated devices will appear at the Chief's bedside along with a nutritious and balanced breakfast.
emotionCheck1:
[A patient isn't too well. Anne is anxious.]

**Anne:** Some patients are getting worse. I saw something similar back when I was at SALVA Hospital...

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** This time, it's bound to be a success.
 * **Anne:** But... back then... I didn't achieve anything.
 * **Anne:** 😖

* **Prompt:** You can do much more now. And I will make sure to help you.
 * **Anne:** Well... thank you, Chief. I'll do what I can!
 * **Anne:** 😉😉
emotionCheck2:
[Anne is looking at some pictures from before and feeling emotional]

**Anne:** Children are so cute... They are innocent and kind.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Did you protect many little angels?
 * **Anne:** Of course. Wherever I can sense them is a paradise to me.
 * **Anne:** 😘😘😘

* **Prompt:** They are not cute at all when they are making trouble
 * **Anne:** It's what every child does. Don't be mad at them.
 * **Anne:** 😖
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Academic Books

//Anne has sent you a request.//

**System Notifications:** A series of theses have been published in Eastside: Surrounding Temperature's Impact on Mania Patients' Neurotransmitters, Current Situation And Development of Mania's Mass Spread, A Study on the Correlation Between Dopamine Receptors And Mania Patients' Cognitive Functions...

**System Notifications:** Anne requests to order all of the above theses.

* **Prompt:** Approve

**Anne:** Thank you, Chief.
supervision2:
++* ⚠ First Aid

//To help the wounded, Anne offered her suggestions.//

**System Notifications:** The Sinners often hurt themselves while training. Anne suggests putting some medkits in the Training Room so that people can get help whenever help is needed.

* **Prompt:** Approve
supervision3:
++* ⚠ Hair Volume

//Someone's asking Anne for hair-thickening tips.//

**System Notifications:** Someone is asking Anne for her tips on maintaining her hair volume.

* **Prompt:** I'm asking too, on behalf of a friend.
supervision4:
++* ⚠ Hard to Achieve

//Anne offered some suggestions to you.//

**System Notifications:** Anne suggests that you wake up at 7 a.m. and go to bed at 11 p.m. every day. A healthy lifestyle is the key to your well-being.

* **Prompt:** Got it. But…
supervision5:
++* ⚠ No Headhunting

//The employees at the medical department filed a request.//

**System Notifications:** Employees of the medical department submitted a joint application letter for Anne to stay in their department.

* **Prompt:** Reject
supervision6:
++* ⚠ Nourishing Congee

//Anne has specifically prepared some health-promoting nourishing congee for you.//

**System Notifications:** You don't feel well and have a poor appetite these days due to the busy work at the Bureau. Anne has specifically prepared some health-promoting nourishing congee for you.

**Chief:** It's indeed very healthy, but also kind of tasteless...

* **Prompt:** Improve the flavors

**System Notifications:** You want to create a set with the nourishing congee: The main dish will be some deep-fried food. A dessert will be added. And replace the nourishing congee with beverages.

**Anne:** No way, Chief. Diet is part of the treatment too. Please take my advice seriously.
supervision7:
++* ⚠⚠ Good Medicine Tastes Bitter

//It seems, with Anne's ability, you can do some interesting experiments.//

**System Notifications:** Anne's Ability Profile: She can alter the chemical natures of any liquid using her mind...

**Anne:** Something wrong, Chief? Do you need my ability to help you with something?

* **Prompt:** I have an idea...
* **Prompt:** Could you help me with an experiment?

**Anne:** So long as you require it, I'd be happy to oblige.

**Chief:** Is it possible to turn this cup of pure water into fruit-flavored water?

**Anne:** ...

**Anne:** Is that why you were checking my profile?

**System Notifications:** She sighed and gently touched the brim of a cup as the transparent liquid strangely turned murky and purple. It smells like plants but pungent.

**Chief:** Are you sure... this is fruit-flavored?

**Anne:** Perhaps the flavor is grapes. You won't know if you don't give it a try.

**Chief:** Or maybe you can turn it back to regular water?

**Chief:** ...Wait, where are you going?

**Anne:** Terribly sorry. I just recalled that I needed to tend to some people's wounds...

**Anne:** If you'll excuse me, Chief. And don't forget to drink it all.
supervision8:
+* ⚠⚠ Hard-Earned Holiday

//The Recreation Area is available to everyone for free today.//

**System Notifications:** The Recreation Area is available for free today. Happy and joyful, the Sinners gather around except Anne who stands alone away from them.

**Chief:** Are you not going to join them in the entertainment activity?

**System Notifications:** Anne laughed.

**Anne:** To me, seeing them play brings me much more joy than playing the game myself.

**Anne:** Besides, I might need to resume my duty at the medical station at any time...

**Anne:** It will ruin everyone's fun if suddenly a player has to leave, don't you think?

* **Prompt:** I'm sure they will understand.
* **Prompt:** You need to get some rest as well.

**Anne:** Thank you, but... I think I'll just stand here and watch.

**Announcement:** Head Nurse Anne. This is the medical department.

**Announcement:** If you are listening to this broadcast, please return to us immediately.

**Announcement:** There is a patient that requires your attention.

* **Prompt:** Leaving so soon?

**Anne:** Sorry, I must leave now.

**Anne:** I hope you will get to have some fun here as well.
supervision9:
++* ⚠⚠ Last Midnight Snack

//Anne doesn't like your eating habit very much.//

**System Notifications:** Anne is browsing through your diet history.

**Anne:** One fried chicken, a bottle of 1.5L soda drink, some french fries, cream cake...

**Anne:** Chief, you sure enjoyed some very tasty food during the night.

* **Prompt:** I-I can explain...
* **Prompt:** This is called supplying!

**Chief:** That's because yesterday's battle drained too much of my stamina. I had to restore my energy, so I ordered an extra help of food.

**Anne:** I see. Sorry, I should've thought of that...

**Anne:** But one late-night supper is not enough to restore your stamina. We must make sure to ingest enough nutrients today.

**Chief:** Yes, you're right.

**Anne:** Well then, would you like to have some bitter gourd to replenish dietary fiber or some edible insects to absorb protein?

**Chief:** ...No, I'm good.

**Anne:** That won't do.

**Anne:** You have been hard at work. You simply must ingest the nutrients.
supervision10:
++* ⚠⚠ Medical Magazine

//Anne seems to really hate a certain medical magazine.//

**System Notifications:** Through the surveillance camera, you see Anne reading a book in the library, and a magazine is dropped on the floor.

**System Notifications:** Anne looks at the magazine's cover. She doesn't pick it up, and even kicks it under the couch when no one's watching.

* **Prompt:** Go and take a look

**System Notifications:** You come to the library and pick up the magazine after some struggle.

**System Notifications:** It's an Eastside medical journal. You're surprised to find Dr. Iron on the cover.

**System Notifications:** The "Cure" Scheme—Dr. Iron's Final Act of Madness

**System Notifications:** The cover reads.

* **Prompt:** Throw the magazine away
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to throw this magazine away. Dr. Iron has already suffered too many slanders for her endeavors to cure Mania.
 * **System Notifications:** You hope to at least preserve a peaceful research environment for her.

* **Prompt:** Put it back on the shelf
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to put the magazine back on the shelf. After all, freedom of discussion is essential to academic debates.
 * **System Notifications:** All points of view should be allowed.
supervision11:
++* ⚠⚠ Sleep-Deprived

//Anne dozes off in the Training Room.//

**System Notifications:** The last round of battle training has just ended in the Training Room. Now it's Anne's turn.

**System Notifications:** Anne is sitting with her head bowed in the chair, her body rising and falling evenly with her breaths.

**Chief:** Anne. Anne?

**Anne:** Oh, Chief? Sorry, I dozed off.

**Anne:** Is it my turn?

**Chief:** You should go back and rest. You've been performing surgeries with [[[Iron | Dr. Iron]]] these past couple days and many patients in the Bureau still require your attention.

**Anne:** No. (Yawns) I'm just... (Yawns) doing my job...

**System Notifications:** Before she finishes, she falls back asleep, her head drooping.

* **Prompt:** Let her sleep
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to stop disturbing Anne and let her rest.

* **Prompt:** Put a blanket over her
 * **System Notifications:** You put a blanket over Anne and let her sleep.

**System Notifications:** Somehow, everyone in the Training Room quiets down too.
supervision12:
++* ⚠⚠ Stray Cat

//A stray cat sneaks into the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** A stray cat has snuck into the Bureau through a vent and climbed onto the top of the greenhouse.

**System Notifications:** The staff members are trying to catch the cat, but it seems to be scared and is facing the crowd with an arched back.

**Anne:** Meow, meow.

**System Notifications:** Holding a small plate of milk, Anne coos at the cat and asks the others to back off a little.

**System Notifications:** Finally, the cat no longer feels scared and comes off the top in small hops. Purring, it starts drinking the milk on the plate.

**Anne:** Chief, can we adopt this cat?

**System Notifications:** Hearing Anne's question, the surrounding staff are looking at you with anticipation too.

* **Prompt:** Of course.
* **Prompt:** That's what I was thinking.

**System Notifications:** Applause breaks out around you.

**Anne:** So cute. What should we name you? Perhaps we should let Chief give you a name.

**System Notifications:** Stroking the lovely cat, Anne gives a reassuring smile.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Seems like it's up to you to take care of things from now on... I just don't know if the patients of SALVA Hospital will take their meds on time without me?

[Raise to Phase 1]
"Wouldn't that person be scared to see what I look like now?"

[Raise to Phase 3]
"If I had such powers back then, perhaps I could have eased their pain..."

[Level Start]
Are you ready? Let's go then.

[Win Battles]
Thank goodness you're okay. I didn't do anything special. The credit belongs to everyone.

[Lose Battles]
Don't be discouraged. It's not your fault. You did a great job.

[Ultimate Skill]
Time to take a shot...

[Die in Battles]
You must... live on...

[Greeting]
Chief, let me know if you need help. Don't be shy with me.

[Conversation 1]
As head nurse, listening is also one of my responsibilities. If you don't mind, I'd be happy to share your burdens.

[Conversation 2]
Everyone loves your smile, Chief, so please do it often! Believe me, your smile is adorable.

[Conversation 3]
Dr. Iron can be scary sometimes. However... I can promise you that she's not a bad person. She must have her reasons for doing things.

[Special Conversation 1]
"Children are adorable. Pure, innocent and carefree... Just like Chief! Gives one the urge to protect them."

[Special Conversation 2]
"Victoria always asks me, "Anne, aren't you tired of smiling all the time?" Be careful, Chief. The kid is surprisingly sharp. Don't get stumped by her like me."

[Special Conversation 3]
"Can Mania Syndrome really be cured? I'm not sure. But even if there's only a sliver of hope, I won't give up. This is a long, uphill battle. Will you join me?"

[Full Compliance]
You can always rely on me. I'm always ready to help you, on patients' affairs or otherwise.

[Idle]
You fell asleep here... work must've been exhausting yesterday! Thank you for your hard work, Chief...

[Annoyed]
Chief, no! I'm going to be upset.

[Special Attention]
What is it? Does looking at me this way make you happy? Alright then, I'll let you look a bit longer.

[Dispatch]
Please help me look after the injured in the Bureau.

[Dispatch Complete]
Sorry for making you wait so long. Did they take their meds on time while I was away?

[Level Up]
Thank you for your help.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Sorry, my room is a bit messy. I didn't have time to clean it up... I'm the one who got caught off guard. Why are you blushing?

[Greeting]
Sure enough, my tummy feels hungry after a hot bath. Mmm... I can already smell the delicious dumplings. Want to stay and have some with me?

[Ordinary Contact 1]
No matter how hard the work, it's worth it to win them more chances to live... Besides, whenever I come back here, I can wash away all the fatigue and get a good rest.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Hmm? Are you worried that I was too busy to eat? Hehe... Don't worry, I can take good care of myself. You're the one I'm worried about, Chief. Did you eat and sleep well when I was away?

[Idle] 
I feel a bit sleepy.

[Annoyed]
You want to brush my hair? Then please be careful. Don't pull on it and hurt me.

[Special Attention] 
You like my smell? Maybe it's the rose oil. It's great for relaxing the mind and relieving fatigue... Hehe, are you feeling sleepy, too? Is that why you keep looking at me?

[Level Up}
A hot bath does wonder for relieving fatigue...
nightmareTalent: All allied units gain a 15% increase in the healing effects received.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Value of Life
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New Exclusive Ultimate [Anesthetic Shot]. Anne shoots an [Anesthetic Shot] at the target allied Sinner, applying [Anesthesia] for 6/8/10 seconds. For the duration, the Sinner is out of action and immune to damage, recovering 5% of Max HP per second. [Anesthetic Shot] can be used only once per battle.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "Even if there is only a tiny sliver of hope, I won't give up."

guide.title: Summary
guide.text: Anne provides one-at-a-time chunk healing that automatically targets lowest HP% ally within range. This means Anne's healing is more favourable when only one or two allies are tanking, however, this doesn't mean she isn't capable of handling AoE (see the video showcase below).

guide.title: Gameplay Tips
guide.text:
- The advantage of her diamond shaped Ult healing range is that it allows for 2 blockers in front of her and lets her heal Sinners in side lanes. 
 - Unlocking ECB is optional for Anne. Her ECB Ult makes a Sinner invulnerable to damage and heals them. This can be slightly useful in Mania Training/story, but it only has one use per battle, and the Sinner is not able to move/attack within this duration. 
 - Anne's Ultimate healing is affected by Attack Speed buffs. The higher Anne's Attack speed is, the faster she heals during Ult. 
 - Anne can heal summons with her Ult, but her passive heal won't target them. 
 - Because Anne's Ult animation is slightly long, if you require immediate healing, make sure to Ult slightly in advance.

pros: Passive heal can target ally anywhere on the map

crimebrandSets.name: Soul Rift + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Reduces DEF of enemies that Anne hits with her Normal Attacks.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Hope + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Provides Anne start-up energy so you can have your first Ult ready quickly. No point in this if you have S4 Anne.

shackles.title: Mass Vaccination
shackles.description: [Nurse's Blessing] Effect duration is extended by 5 seconds.

shackles.title: Long-term Treatment
shackles.description: [Nurse's Blessing] While activated, Anne gains a 5% healing effect bonus each time she heals the same allied unit, capped at 5 stacks.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: Anne gains 20 energy when battle starts.

skills.name: Inject
skills.description: Anne attacks with an enhanced syringe, dealing (89% of Attack damage) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Nurse's Blessing
skills.description: Anne breaks the limit, keeping restoring (90% of her Attack) HP to the ally with the lowest HP percentage within a diamond area around her in the next 18 seconds, during which she can't automatically recover her energy.

skills.name: Medical Logistics
skills.description: During a battle, Anne automatically heals an allied Sinner with the lowest HP percentage, making them immediately restore (140% of self Attack) HP. The effect has a 10 second cooldown.

skills.name: Tender Yet Strict
skills.description: For every 10% of Max HP Anne's healing target loses, her healing effect is increased by 2%.

upgrade.description: Healing Effect bonus is increased to $0%.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Attack +3, Defense +3
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack + 4, Defense + 3, Unlock Requirements: Battle 10 times without support
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Complete Ann's Review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Terms, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Good relatives in white clothes
mirage:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ A Kindergarten

//Anne teaches you some skills on managing little kids.//

**System Notifications:** With the daily tasks in the Bureau, you already have your plate full, but these Sinners under you give you an even bigger headache.

**System Notifications:** It’s almost mission possible to get this dangerous and agitated bunch to listen to you.

**System Notifications:** Meanwhile, you see Anne playing happily with several kids.

**Chief:** Anne, how do you get along so well with kids?

**Anne:** It’s actually very simple. First, you must listen to them.

**Anne:** But sometimes when children talk to you, they’re not asking for something but merely expressing their emotions.

* **Prompt:** Mmm. Hmm.

**Anne:** Next, you need to make every child feel that you value them and care about them.

**Anne:** That’s why you should never neglect them whether or not something particular happens.

* **Prompt:** I see.

**Anne:** Finally, children can actually feel your attitude toward them.

**Anne:** If you want them to fulfill your expectations, you have to love them genuinely.

* **Prompt:** Oh. Hmm.

**Anne:** Do you understand now, Chief?

* **Prompt:** I understand
 * **Chief:** Awesome! I get it now! I know how to manage the Sinners!
 * **Anne:** Oh, are you going to treat us like little kids, Chief?
 * **Anne:** That's not good.
 * **Anne:** Then again, the Bureau does feel like a huge kindergarten.

* **Prompt:** I don't understand
 * **Chief:** I still don’t fully understand. After all, managing kids and managing Sinners are different.
 * **Anne:** That’s alright, Chief. You can try to treat us like you would treat little kids.
 * **Anne:** After all, we were all children once, weren't we?
supervision13:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ A Kindergarten

//Anne teaches you some skills on managing little kids.//

**System Notifications:** With the daily tasks in the Bureau, you already have your plate full, but these Sinners under you give you an even bigger headache.

**System Notifications:** It's almost mission possible to get this dangerous and agitated bunch to listen to you.

**System Notifications:** Meanwhile, you see Anne playing happily with several kids.

**Chief:** Anne, how do you get along so well with kids?

**Anne:** It's actually very simple. First, you must listen to them.

**Anne:** But sometimes when children talk to you, they're not asking for something but merely expressing their emotions.

* **Prompt:** Mmm. Hmm.

**Anne:** Next, you need to make every child feel that you value them and care about them.

**Anne:** That's why you should never neglect them whether or not something particular happens.

* **Prompt:** I see.

**Anne:** Finally, children can actually feel your attitude toward them.

**Anne:** If you want them to fulfill your expectations, you have to love them genuinely.

* **Prompt:** Oh. Hmm.

**Anne:** Do you understand now, Chief?

* **Prompt:** I understand.
 * **Chief:** Awesome! I get it now! I know how to manage the Sinners!
 * **Anne:** Oh, are you going to treat us like little kids, Chief?
 * **Anne:** That's not good.
 * **Anne:** Then again, the Bureau does feel like a huge kindergarten.

* **Prompt:** I don't understand.
 * **Chief:** You still don't fully understand. After all, managing kids and managing Sinners are different.
 * **Anne:** That's alright, Chief. You can try to treat us like you would treat little kids.
 * **Anne:** After all, we were all children once, weren't we?

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Seems like it's up to you to take care of things from now on... I just don't know if the patients of SALVA Hospital will take their meds on time without me?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP:
これからどうぞよろしくお願いします……
はぁ……私がいなくても、彼岸の患者さんたちはちゃんと薬を飲んでるかしら？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 앞으로 잘 부탁드려야겠네요… 다만 제가 없으면 병원 환자들이 약을 잘 먹을지 모르겠습니다.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 看来今后要麻烦您多多关照了……只是不知道没有我在，彼岸的病人们会不会按时吃药呢？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 看來今後要麻煩您多多關照了……只是不知道沒有我在，彼岸的病人們會不會按時吃藥呢？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: Wouldn't that person be scared to see what I look like now?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: 今の私を見たら、あの人はびっくりするでしょうね？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 그 사람이 지금 내 모습을 보면 깜짝 놀라겠지요?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 那个人看到我现在的样子，会吓一跳吧？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 那個人看到我現在的樣子，會嚇一跳吧？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: If I had such powers back then, perhaps I could have eased their pain...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: あの時にこんな力を持っていたら、もう少し彼らの痛みを和らげることができたのかもしれませんね……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 만약 그때의 나도 이런 힘을 가질 수 있었다면, 그들의 고통을 조금이라도 덜어 줄 수 있었을 텐데...
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 如果那个时候，我也能拥有这样的力量，或许他们的痛苦，能再少一些……
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 如果那個時候，我也能擁有這樣的力量，或許他們的痛苦，能再少一些……
voicelines.Level Start - EN: Are you ready? Let's go then.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 準備はいいですか？それでは出発しましょう。
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 准备好了吗？那我们出发咯。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 準備好了嗎？那我們出發囉。
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: Thank goodness you're okay. I didn't do anything special. The credit belongs to everyone.
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 無事で何よりです。私は何もしていませんよ。皆さんが頑張った結果です。
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 그저 당신이 무사하면 그걸로 됐습니다. 저는 특별히 한 게 없는걸요, 전부 여러분들 덕분이죠.
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: 您平安无事就好。我没做什么特别的，都是大家的功劳。
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 您平安無事就好。我沒做什麼特別的，都是大家的功勞。
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: Don't be discouraged. It's not your fault. You did a great job.
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: 気を落とさないでください。これはあなたのせいじゃありません。あなたはよく頑張っていましたよ。
voicelines.Lose Battles - KR: 상심하지 말아요, 당신 탓이 아니에요. 이미 충분히 잘하셨는걸요.
voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 别灰心，这不是您的错，您已经做得很好了。
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 別灰心，這不是您的錯，您已經做得很好了。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: は～い、注射の時間ですよ～
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: あなたは必ず……生き延びてください……。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Chief, let me know if you need help. Don't be shy with me.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 局長さん、何かお手伝いすることがあればいつでも言ってください。私の前では無理をしなくてもいいんですからね？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 국장님, 도움이 필요하시면 언제든지 말씀 주세요. 제 앞에서는 무리하지 않으셔도 돼요.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 局长，有什么需要帮忙的可以告诉我，在我面前您不用勉强自己。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 局長，有什麼需要幫忙的可以告訴我，在我面前您不用勉強自己。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: As head nurse, listening is also one of my responsibilities. If you don't mind, I'd be happy to share your burdens.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 人の悩みを聞くのも看護師長の役目です。私でよければ、いつでもお話を聞きますよ。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 경청도 간호사의 역할 중 하나니까, 괜찮으시다면 기꺼이 당신의 걱정을 분담하겠습니다.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 倾听也是看护长的职责之一。如果您不介意的话，我很乐意分担您的烦恼。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 傾聽也是護理長的職責之一。如果您不介意的話，我很樂意分擔您的煩惱。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: Everyone loves your smile, Chief, so please do it often! Believe me, your smile is adorable.
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 局長さんの微笑みは皆さんの元気の素なんですよ。だからもっと笑ってください。笑うとかわいいんですから。私が保証します。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 국장님의 미소는 모두의 자양분이니 많이 웃어 주세요. 저를 믿어보시라니까요? 국장님은 웃을 때 가장 귀여우세요!
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 局长的微笑是大家的养分呢，所以，请多笑一笑吧。相信我，您笑起来很可爱。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 局長的微笑是大家的養分呢，所以，請多笑一笑吧。相信我，您笑起來很可愛。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Dr. Iron can be scary sometimes. However... I can promise you that she's not a bad person. She must have her reasons for doing things.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: ふふ、確かにアインは怖い時もありますが……彼女は決して悪い人ではありません。私が保証します。彼女なりに理由があって行動しているはずです。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 아이언 선생님이 가끔은 무서울 때도 있죠. 그렇지만… 제가 장담하는데, 그녀는 절대 나쁜 사람이 아니에요. 그녀가 무언가를 하려고 한다면 분명히 그 이유가 있을 것입니다.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 艾恩有时候确实有些可怕。不过…我向您保证，她绝对不是什么坏人，她做事一定有她的理由。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 艾恩有時候確實有些可怕。不過…我向您保證，她絕對不是什麼壞人，她做事一定有她的理由。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: Children are adorable. Pure, innocent and carefree... Just like Chief! Gives one the urge to protect them.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 子供って本当にかわいいですよね。天真爛漫で、悩みがなくて、単純で……ふふ、局長さんと同じで、つい守りたくなってしまいます。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 어린애는 정말 귀엽다니까요. 순수하고 천진하고 아무 걱정 없는 듯… 국장님처럼, 지켜주고 싶어져요.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 小孩子真可爱啊，天真、单纯、无忧无虑…和局长一样，让人忍不住想要守护。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 小孩子真可愛啊，天真、單純、無憂無慮…和局長一樣，讓人忍不住想要守護。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Victoria always asks me, "Anne, aren't you tired from smiling all the time?" Be careful, Chief. That kid is surprisingly sharp. Don't get stumped by her like me.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 「アン姉さん、ずっと笑ってるのって疲れないの？」とビクトリアさんによく聞かれます。はぁ……局長さんも気をつけてください。あの子は意外と鋭いんですよ。私は返す言葉が見つかりませんでした。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 빅토리아가 종종 나에게 '계속 웃고 있으면 피곤하지 않냐'라고 묻곤 해요. 국장님도 조심하세요. 쟤가 의외로 예리해서 자칫 잘못하다가는 나처럼 말려든다니까요?
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 维多利亚经常问我“安姐姐，一直微笑真的不会累吗”。局长也要小心咯，这孩子意外的敏锐呢，可别像我一样被她问住了。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 維多利亞經常問我「安姐姐，一直微笑真的不會累嗎」。局長也要小心囉，這孩子意外的敏銳呢，可別像我一樣被她問倒了。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Can Syndrome Mania really be cured? I'm not sure. But even if there's only a sliver of hope, I won't give up. This is a long, uphill battle. Will you join me?
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 狂瞳病は本当に治るんでしょうか？私には分かりません。ですが、可能性がわずかでもある限り私は諦めません。これは厳しい持久戦になるでしょう。それでも一緒に……戦ってくれますか？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 과연 감염된 환자가 완치되는 것이 가능한 일일까요? 전 확신할 수 없다고 생각해요. 하지만 만 분의 일의 가능성일지라도 포기하지 않을 거예요. 이건 아주 힘들고 긴 장기전이지만, 그래도 당신만은… 저와 함께해 주실 거죠?
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 狂厄真的能够被治愈吗？我不确定。但哪怕只有万分之一的可能，我都不会放弃的。这是一场艰苦的持久战，您……愿意和我一起吗？
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 狂厄真的能夠被治癒嗎？我不確定。但哪怕只有萬分之一的可能，我都不會放棄的。這是一場艱苦的持久戰，您……願意和我一起嗎？
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: You can always rely on me. I'm always ready to help you, on patients' affairs or otherwise.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: あの……もっと私を頼ってくださっていいんですよ？ 患者さんと関係があってもなくても、あなたのためなら、力になりたいんです。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 국장님… 사실은 저에게 좀 더 의지하셔도 괜찮아요. 환자와 관련이 있든 없든… 당신에게 도움이 된다면 다 해 볼게요.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 您……其实可以更加依赖我一些。无论是否和患者相关，只要能帮到您，我都愿意试试的。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 您……其實可以更加依賴我一些。無論是否和患者相關，只要能幫到您，我都願意試試的。
voicelines.Idle - EN: You fell asleep here... work must've been exhausting yesterday! Thank you for your hard work, Chief...
voicelines.Idle - JP: こんなところで寝てしまうなんて……昨日も遅くまで仕事をされていたようですね？……ふふ、お疲れさまでした、局長さん。
voicelines.Idle - KR: 이런 곳에서 잠이 들었다니… 어제 또 늦게까지 일했나 보군요? 수고하셨어요, 국장님~
voicelines.Idle - CN: 居然在这种地方睡着了……看来，昨天又工作到很晚吧？辛苦了，局长~
voicelines.Idle - TW: 居然在這種地方睡著了……看來，昨天又工作到很晚吧？辛苦了，局長~
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Chief, no! I'm going to be upset.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 局長さん、ダメですよ。怒りますからね。
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 局长，不可以哦，我要生气了。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 局長，不可以哦，我要生氣了。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: What is it? Does looking at me this way make you happy? Alright then. I'll let you look a bit longer.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP:
どうかしましたか？もしかして、私を見ているとドキドキしちゃうのかしら？
ふふ……はいはい、それじゃあもう少し見ていても構いませんよ。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 왜요? 이렇게 보고만 있어도 기분이 좋아져요? 그래요, 그렇다면 조금만 더 보게 해줄게요.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 怎么了，这样看着我能让您心情变好吗？好吧，那就让您再多看一会吧。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 怎麼了，這樣看著我能讓您心情變好嗎？好吧，那就讓您再多看一會吧。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: Please help me look after the injured in the Bureau.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: ひとまず、管理局の負傷者はお願いしますね。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 관리국 내의 부상자는 우선 국장님께 잘 부탁드릴게요.
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 管理局内的伤员，就先拜托您了。
voicelines.Dispatch - TW: 管理局內的傷患，就先拜託您了。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Sorry for making you wait so long. Did they take their meds on time while I was away?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: ただいま戻りました。私がいない間、患者さんたちはちゃんと湿布を取り換えていましたか？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 오래 기다리셨습니다. 제가 없는 동안, 그들이 약은 제때 먹었나요?
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 让您久等了，我不在的时候，他们有按时换药吗？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 讓您久等了，我不在的時候，他們有按時換藥嗎？
voicelines.Level Up - JP: お気遣い、ありがとうございます。

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Sorry, my room is a bit messy. I didn't have time to clean it up... I'm the one who got caught off guard. Why are you blushing?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 部屋が散らかっていてごめんなさい。片付ける時間がなかったので……ふふ、不意打ちされたのは私なのに、どうしてあなたが顔を赤くしているのですか？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 죄송해요. 방이 좀 더럽죠. 아직 정리를 다 못 해서… 당황해야 할 사람은 전데 왜 국장님이 얼굴을 붉히세요?
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 抱歉，房间里有点乱，还没来得及收拾……被打了个措手不及的人明明是我，怎么反倒是您先脸红起来了？
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 抱歉，房間裡有點亂，還沒來得及收拾……被打了個措手不及的人明明是我，怎麼反倒是您先臉紅起來了？
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Sure enough, my tummy feels hungry after a hot bath. Mmm... I can already smell the delicious dumplings. Want to stay and have some with me?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: やっぱり、お風呂に入るとお腹が空きますね。ん～餃子のいい匂い。一緒に食べませんか？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 역시 따뜻한 물로 샤워하니까 배가 고파지기 시작하네요. 음~ 맛있는 만두 냄새가 나네요. 여기서 같이 드실래요?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 果然洗完热水澡之后，肚子就开始饿了。嗯~我已经闻到饺子的香味了，要留下来一起尝尝吗？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 果然洗完熱水澡之後，肚子就開始餓了。嗯~我已經聞到餃子的香味了，要留下來一起嚐嚐嗎？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: No matter how hard the work, it's worth it to win them more chances to live... Besides, whenever I come back here, I can wash away all the fatigue and get a good rest.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: 彼らが生き延びるチャンスが増えるなら、大変でもやる意味はあります……それに、ここに戻ってくると疲れを洗い流してゆっくり休めますから～
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 그들을 위해 살아갈 기회를 더 쟁취해낼 수만 있다면 아무리 힘들어도 가치가 있는 일이죠… 게다가 이곳으로 돌아오면 모든 피로를 씻어내고 푹 쉴 수도 있잖아요~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 能为他们多争取几分活下去的机会，再辛苦也是值得的……况且，只要回到这里，就能洗去所有的疲惫，好好休息啦~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 能為他們多爭取幾分活下去的機會，再辛苦也是值得的……況且，只要回到這裡，就能洗去所有的疲憊，好好休息啦~
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Hmm? Are you worried that I was too busy to eat? Hehe... Don't worry, I can take good care of myself. You're the one I'm worried about, Chief. Did you eat and sleep well when I was away?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: え？私が忙しくて夕飯を食べていないことを心配してくれたのですか？ふふ……安心してください。自分の面倒は見られますよ。逆に私がいない間、局長はちゃんとご飯を食べて休んでいましたか？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 네? 제가 너무 바빠서 저녁도 못 먹었을까 봐 걱정되세요? 후후… 스스로 잘 챙기고 있으니 걱정하지 마세요. 국장님도 제가 없을 때 밥 잘 챙겨 드시고 잘 쉬셔야 할 텐데. 잘 지내고 계셨죠?
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 嗯？是因为担心我太忙了吃不上晚餐？呵呵……放心吧，我会照顾好自己的，倒是局长您，我不在的时候，有按时吃饭，好好休息吗？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 嗯？是因為擔心我太忙了吃不上晚餐？呵呵……放心吧，我會照顧好自己的，倒是局長您，我不在的時候，有按時吃飯，好好休息嗎？
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: You want to brush my hair? Then please be careful. Don't pull on it and hurt me.
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 髪を拭いてくれるのですか？それなら、引っ張らないように気をつけてくださいね。
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 제 머리를 대신 말려주시려고요? 그럼 살살해 주세요. 아픈 건 싫거든요.
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 是要帮我擦头发么？那您可得小心点，别把我扯疼了。
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 是要幫我擦頭髮嗎？那您可得小心點，別把我扯疼了。
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: You like my smell? Maybe it's the rose oil. It's great for relaxing the mind and relieving fatigue... Hehe, are you feeling sleepy, too? Is that why you keep looking at me?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 私からいい匂いがする？ローズオイルを使っているからかもしれません。心をリラックスさせ、疲れを癒やすのに役立つのですよ……ふふ、ちょっと眠くなってきましたか？でなければ、どうしてずっと私を見ているのでしょうか？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 제 몸에서 나는 향기가 좋다고요? 장미 오일을 써서 그런 걸지도 몰라요~ 정신을 안정시키고 피로를 푸는 데 도움이 많이 되거든요… 후후, 국장님도 조금 졸리시죠? 그게 아니라면 왜 저를 계속 쳐다보세요?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 我身上的味道很好闻？可能是用了玫瑰精油吧~它对放松精神缓解疲劳很有用……呵呵，您是不是也有点困了？不然怎么一直看着我呀？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 我身上的味道很好聞？可能是用了玫瑰精油吧~它對放鬆精神緩解疲勞很有用……呵呵，您是不是也有點睏了？不然怎麼一直看著我呀？
voicelines.Level Up - EN: A hot bath does wonders for relieving fatigue...
voicelines.Level Up - JP: 温かいお風呂は、疲労回復に効果的ですよ～
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 따뜻한 물로 샤워하면 피로 회복에 좋아요~
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 热水澡对缓解疲劳很有用哦~
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 熱水澡對緩解疲勞很有用哦~
